details.description: Your favorite scents make a splash with aquatic notes of peach tea, juicy watermelon, and iridescent lotus. Pair with matching Fragrance Lotion.
features: Notes: raspberry glisten, peach tea, pomelo drip

details.description: Juicy Passionfruit • Honey Nectar • Coconut Palms Juicy superfruits, meet pure honey. This is your recipe for golden, glowy skin—all year round. Bright with notes of juicy passionfruit, honey nectar, and coconut palms, this super-light, all-over fragrance mist captures the vibe of a sundrenched day—full of fresh air, tropical fruit, and golden light.

Made with notes of Peach Nectar, White Freesia and Shaved Coconut this lightweight scent delivers the perfect touch of fragrance and treats your senses to a day at the beach (without having to leave the house).

One spritz of these coconut-laced scents and you’re whisked away to an island getaway—no flight required. Tropic Vanilla evokes a soft island breeze, mingling hits of citrusy lime, creamy Monoi blooms and white coconut flower with a fresh dose of chilled Vanilla. These feel-good, vacation-inspired scents are formulated with essential oils, delivering the perfect touch of fragrance.

One spritz of these coconut-laced scents and you’re whisked away to an island getaway—no flight required. Coconut Sun channels golden glow of a day at the beach, sun tan lotion and warm, sunny rays. This subtle, evocative mix of coconut and vanilla notes with uplifting ylang-ylang is warm, comforting and full of sunshine. These feel-good, vacation-inspired scents are formulated with essential oils, delivering the perfect touch of fragrance.

One spritz of these coconut-laced scents and you’re whisked away to an island getaway—no flight required. Pink Beach is pure, sun-kissed bliss. Sweet, juicy notes of papaya nectar, fresh pineapple, and coconut transport you straight to a tropical paradise. These feel-good, vacation-inspired scents are formulated with essential oils, delivering the perfect touch of fragrance.

Fresh. Dreamy. Cozy. And beyond! Mist your world with our collection of feel-good scents, formulated with Essential Oils and mood-lifting notes. Spritz yourself with a soft fragrance that evokes sipping a cool Pina Colada with a warm ocean breeze in your hair. It’s the perfect light scent that mingles with your natural skin. Wear on its own or as a base for layering.

products.title: HONEY BODY MIST WITH ESSENTIAL OILS

details.description: Inspired by our best-selling Honey Body Care—made by bees. This liquid gold Honey scent is both addicting and comforting, formulated with essential oils and mood-lifting notes like Honey Drizzle, Purple Dahlia and Whipped Vanilla.
Your favorite scents make a splash with aquatic notes of peach tea, juicy watermelon, and iridescent lotus. Pair with matching Fragrance Lotion.
features: Notes: raspberry glisten, peach tea, pomelo drip
